Bug 112081 has the same root problem that causes this bug, which has been fixed. Marking as a dupe

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 112081 ***
Wasn't that bug fixed on April 12? I would think I would have had the fix in the latest debug code...the exception was in my debug target.
